title: Client Window Huge & 1/3 Disappears When Clicked upon

embed.description: Provides free image upload and hosting integration for forums. Free picture hosting and photo sharing for websites and blogs.

body:
Alright i stared a discussion in the Alpha but seams that no one listened so screens included.My initial client screen display is resized at a 100% on a 1024 x 768 screen.The issue is that whenever i try to move the client the chat and contacts vanish,can't talk to anyone in my contacts can't even see them #feelsbadman .I cannot resize the client at all.Help Riot with this potato code issue.

initial client screen https://postimg.org/image/mitoncbvv/

when logged in https://postimg.org/image/gfvtl1mlz/

if i click on the client while logged in https://postimg.org/image/qnz5ya4ld/

where is my friends list? https://postimg.org/image/btqbzcayx/

replies.body:
Try pressing WinKey + Ctrl + Minus or WinKey + Ctrl + Plus to resize the client.

{{champion:17}}
